actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant attacks twice with its greatsword.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 44 (10d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it makes a DC 22 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The giant throws a lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of that point makes a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw  taking 56 (16d6) lightning damage on a success or half the damage on a failure.

actions.name: Sword Sweep (While Bloodied)
actions.desc: The giant makes a greatsword attack against each creature within 10 feet. Each creature hit with this attack makes a DC 22 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

bonus_actions.name: Stomp
bonus_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller prone target. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The giants spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light, 3/day each: control water, control weather, water breathing, 1/day: commune
